thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 31 of 515
thread.title: Alessandra

author: Alessandra
title: Alessandra
text: My package arrived right on time and I loved the quality. I was sick of spending a couple dollars on cheap leggings so I wanted to try Fabletics. Best decision I have ever made! My first order was two pairs of leggings and a shirt for 30$ and my second purchase was two leggings for 10$ because I used my store credit. Recommend to anyone...a bunch of my friends signed up after they saw me at school!
